posts.post_content: Want a worthless green vanilla five-drop? You're better off with [Rotted Hystrix](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rotted Hystrix). While not *strictly* strictly worse, Nema Siltlurker is more or less the same card with one less toughness and a much less relevant creature type. Both of the aforementioned cards will waste your time, but Nema Siltlurker gains the unenviable title of being a card so worthless that another worthless card outclasses it in every regard.
posts.html:
